mdRecord.dcterms:title: Les oeures Maistre Francoys Villon: Le Monologue du franc Archier de Baignollet. Le Dyalogue des seigneurs de Malle paye & Bailleuent
Villon, François, 1431-1463. Works. 1533
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Villon, François, 1431-1463 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Printed by Alain Lotrian and D. Janot, according to Brunet; by Jean Trepperel, according to the Hoe Catalogue. [original]
Colophon: Fin des oeures & repues de feu Maistre Fra[n]coys Villon nouuellement imprimees a Paris. M.D.XXXIII. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Mercier. Bookplate of Robert Hoe. Inscription on t.p. dated Jan. 24, 1704. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 374. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: French poetry--To 1500
